name: Memento (itch) (MMatos)
description:
There are some things you should never forget. Souvenir takes the player on a sentimental journey through the depths of the mind, where he must find memories of a certain watch. It is a challenging puzzle game in which you must look for shapes created by the surrounding objects. 

Control keys: WSAD
Sprint: Shift
When the objects line up into the shape located at the bottom of the screen, click on it with the right mouse button.
A characteristic sound will lead you to the place from which you will be able to see the mentioned shape.
Interact with the blue and red blocks by clicking the right mouse button on them.
